name: NSScroller.Part
desc: These constants specify the different parts of the scroller:

items.name: case knob
items.desc: Directly to the scroller’s value, as given by floatValue.

items.name: case knobSlot
items.desc: Directly to the scroller’s value, as given by floatValue.

items.name: case decrementPage
items.desc: Up or left by a large amount.

items.name: case incrementPage
items.desc: Down or right by a large amount.
